english: On the issue of diminished responsibility, none of the facts were disputed by the appellant .
chinese: 对减轻责任这个问题，上诉人未就任何论据进行争辩。

english: The petitioner ask for a variation in her maintenance order
chinese: 上诉人要求对她生活费的命令的条件进行变更。

english: The appellant shall also be informed of any right to further appeal
chinese: 上诉人还应被告知可进一步上诉的任何权利。

english: Financial assistance to appellants under section 26a of the legal aid ordinance
chinese: 根据法律援助条例第26a条为上诉人提供经济援助

english: A copy of any written representations made under section 82a by the appellant
chinese: 上诉人?据第82a ( 4 )条作出的任何书面申述的副本一份。
上诉人造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: A copy of any written representations made under section 82a ( 4 ) by the appellant
chinese: 上诉人?据第82a ( 4 )条作出的任何书面申述的副本一份。

english: But the appellant had his original jail term of three and a half years reduced to three years
chinese: 上诉人的刑期则由原来的三年半减至三年。

english: More particularly , the skeleton argument lodged by the applicant appellant should outline
chinese: 尤其要注意，申请人上诉人呈交的论据大纲须概述

english: Form ait - 2 section 6 must be signed by the appellant or if you have one , your representative
chinese: 上诉人或上诉代理人（如果您有一个的话）必须在

english: During the legal proceeding period , the probationary period of the appellant would also count
chinese: 在法律程序进行期间，上诉人的暂准期亦会计算在内。

english: During the legal proceeding period , the probationary period of the appellant would also count
chinese: 在法律程序进行期间，上诉人的暂准期亦会计算在内。

english: We represent either the appellant ( the appealing party ) or the appellee ( the responding party )
chinese: 我行既可以代表上诉人提出上诉，也可以代表被上诉人应对上诉。

english: The clerk will set a date for the hearing of the appeal , giving 14 clear days notice
chinese: 书记须编定该项上诉的聆讯时间，并给予上诉人及局长14整天的上诉聆讯通知。

english: The appealent or the commissioner may appeal to the courts against the decision of the board of review
chinese: 上诉人或局长可就税务上诉委员会的决定向法院提出上诉。

english: The clerk will set a date for the hearing of the appeal , giving 14 clear days notice
chinese: 书记须编定该项上诉的聆讯时间，并给予上诉人及局长14整天的上诉聆讯通知。
